title: Digital Storytelling-Based LMOOC Design for Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language education theory and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented course to enhance pre-service/in-service teachers' competency in designing language learning MOOCs. Development of pedagogical approaches using digital storytelling and connectivist methodologies

learning_goals: Learners can design language learning scenarios using digital storytelling techniques
Learners can develop LMOOC activity modules based on connectivist learning theory
Learners can create and evaluate interactive language learning content in VR/simulation environments
Learners can complete practical LMOOC design documents through project-based assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
